1.title: Sweet Melissa's Patisserie
1.plot: This quaint and upscale neighborhood bakery in Brooklyn, NY may bake delicious gourmet treats but unfortunately that's not all they're making. Can Wa$ted! host, Annabelle Gurwitch provide the right ingredients to change their wasteful ways?

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: This true to life "Brady Bunch" style family of nine is creating far more waste than necessary. Can Wa$ted host, Annabelle Gurwitch, teach them how to reduce their waste or will her challenge tear the family apart?

3.title: The Fernandes Family
3.plot: Eldest son Tony Jr. has been trying to convince his family of five that their wasteful practices are unnecessary and too costly to continue. Will Wa$ted host Annabelle Gurwitch be able to help the family see the error of their ways?

4.title: Once Upon a Sundae
4.plot: Wa$ted! host, Annabelle Gurwitch visits a kids party throwing business in Long Island, NY. With so many disposable dishes, discarded arts and crafts, toxic paints and polish, they are unleashing a nightmare on the planet.

5.title: These Three Bachelors
5.plot: Rudy, Matt and Randall work hard and play hard but their lifestyle is leaving a wasteful trail behind them. To get to the meat of this problem, Wa$ted! host, Annabelle Gurwitch, brings them face to face with their consumption.

6.title: Driving Mrs. New Jersey
6.plot: Mrs. New Jersey, her car obsessed husband Lorenzo, and their beautiful children are living quite the lavish lifestyle. Will they be able to succeed at WA$TED host Annabelle Gurwitch's challenge to change their ways?

7.title: The Space Family
7.plot: Wa$ted! host, Annabelle Gurwitch has met her match with the Space Family. These hunters and Zoo keepers maintain that global warming is for attention seekers and that the world will never run out of electricity.

8.title: Hyper Diapers
8.plot: Mary Jo and Bob have four kids - under the age of two! However they're not painting the prettiest picture for the environment. WA$TED host Annabelle Gurwitch pays a visit to try and put an end to problems such as 13,000 disposable diapers a year.

9.title: Paper Capers
9.plot: Challenged by an industry that is one of the paper wasting leaders by nature, Wa$ted host Annabelle Gurwitch has her work cut out for her when visiting the advertising agency, EFK Group.

10.title: Gone to the Dogs
10.plot: Wa$ted! host, Annabelle Gurwitch visits Five Star Kennels, a family run dog grooming, boarding and training facility - will she be able to teach them to curb their wasteful ways?

1.title: Sex & the City
1.plot: Kisha, Donna, Cindy and Becky live in an amazing loft space in trendy Green Point in Brooklyn. But long showers, leaving lights on, excessive shopping, and huge amounts of trash are the norm in this pad. These girls need help!

2.title: Nappy Nightmare
2.plot:

3.title: Country Living

6.title: Wrap It Up
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Water Waste
7.plot: Annabelle and Holter visit Mike and Julie's dream house which is sapping their savings with huge energy costs and family habits that need to change. Mom, Dad, four kids, and even their three dogs and two cats, take on Annabelle's challenge.

8.title: Troublesome Trash
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Lazy, Landfill Layabouts
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Up in Smoke
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Everybody Gets a Car!
11.plot: From fuel costs to lights on 24/7, the Zeller family's waste starkly contrasts with their house. On the outside, their house looks like a grandiose castle Manor, but inside, their medieval wasteful habits need our makeover.

12.title: Fraternal Affairs
12.plot: Sigma Pi Fraternity is home to 17 frat guys who don't have a clue about how wasteful they can be. These dudes work hard in school, but also play hard at home, and efforts to conserve are overlooked for convenience.

13.title: NYPD Green
13.plot: Meet Todd and Rita Colainni, and their baby son, Travis. They have been so wrapped up in raising their son that they have neglected their environmental concerns. From wasting electricity to gas guzzling SUV's, it's time for the family to make a change!

14.title: Style Over Substance
14.plot: James and Dean's fast paced habits are bad for the environment. From long wasteful showers, to cabs out to all the clubs, to throwing out yesterday's fashions - these men should know better - and we will send in the experts to show them.

15.title: Clean Up This Mess
15.plot: The Cavallaros are your typical nuclear family with 2 kids, a dog, and NINE televisions that are always on. This family thinks recycling is a waste of space; they don't even have a bin. The family is crying for a green clean up.

16.title: He Said, She Said
16.plot: Glynis Hutchinson is very interested in making her household eco-friendly but doesn't know where to start. Her husband Howard, on the other hand, is not so concerned and would rather take convenience over conservation.

17.title: Bend It Like Livingston
17.plot: Dawn and Rich Livingston are the proud parents of three precocious daughters in a high-end gated community in southern New Jersey. This family is filled with energy, is always on the go, but is also wasting energy left and right.

18.title: Whre There's Smoke
18.plot: Joe is engaged to Laurel, who live in a house in rural New Jersey with her sister, Alexa. They love living in the country and their house would be a perfect model of green living, except their road to green is paved with good intentions gone sour.

19.title: Bed and Breakfast
19.plot: The Alexander Hamilton House is a charming Bed and Breakfast in New York. Come and stay in this 8 bedroom inn, enjoy the scenic views of the Hudson River, the heated pool, and please feel free to contribute to an astronomical energy bill - $1600 a month!

1.title: Green Preservation
1.plot: A young family in the process of restoring their vintage home, use toxic chemicals and live with dangerous indoor fumes from paint strippers and household cleaning supplies. Annabelle and Holter introduce them to an array of eco-friendly alternatives.

2.title: Firemen Go Green
2.plot: This suburban firehouse never closes. And in a 24/7 world, the lights stay on, the doors stay open and there's lots of trash. From recycling to recipes, Annabelle and Holter show 20 firefighters how to green up their place of business.

3.title: Rockin' Out in Staten Island
3.plot: The Salome home redefines 'excess'.The family spends an astounding $20,000 a year on utilities. But if money's no object, the way the Salome's trash the planet certainly is, making this Annabelle and Holter's biggest challenge yet.

4.title: A Basic Education
4.plot: At a busy pre-school, Annabelle and Holter instruct children and teachers alike about ways to go green. A new game turns the kids onto recycling, and their teachers learn to start setting the example with new, eco-friendly products.

5.title: Grandma Knows Best
5.plot: With three generations living together, this family's 1800's vintage house generates huge energy bills. Annabelle and Holter show them innovative ways to cut costs, change bad habits and protect the environment.

6.title: Sisterhood of Wa$te
6.plot: Classes officially start for the girls that live at the Alpha Chi Omega Sorority House, when Annabelle and Holter give them their assignments. Will they get an A in waste management or will it turn out to be a wasted opportunity?

7.title: A Hairy Problem
7.plot: A beauty salon has environmental challenges no household could imagine. Annabelle and Holter offer stylish solutions and even show the owners how to recycle all that hair!

8.title: Sabbath Green
8.plot: The Ehrlich family observes Orthodox Jewish teaching to the letter of the law. Annabelle and Holter help them learn to keep faith with the environment as well.

-1.title: Elle's Challenge
-1.plot: Elle McGee's world dramatically changed when husband Ed was called to active duty in Iraq, leaving her on her own with a chilly house and baby son, Malachi. Elle goes into eco-plan overdrive when Annabelle and Holter come to the rescue.

imdb.plot outline: A half-hour factual entertainment series that proves you don't have to be extreme to be green. From worm farms to rainwater butts and solar power to heat pumps, we take your average household of eco horrors and turn it into a clean green haven, saving our families serious cash in the process. Every week we take a different family, audit their waste and energy usage with our unique eco calculator and confront them with the terrifying truth about their long-term impact on the planet. Our eco-expert will put them on a green regime to clean up their act. After tracking the family we re-calculate their household footprint and hand over their cash savings. WASTED! is an information-rich series that transforms your average eco criminal into your ultimate green convert.
imdb.title: Wasted
plot: A television series in which different households work to make their homes "green" living spaces.::Anonymous
